content.query:
USE fmdp_db;
GO

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE name = 'gld_av_time_series_daily')
BEGIN
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE gld_av_time_series_daily;
END

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gld_av_time_series_daily
(
    [date] DATE,
    [symbol] VARCHAR(20) NULL,
    [open] FLOAT,
    [high] FLOAT,
    [low] FLOAT,
    [close] FLOAT,
    [volume] BIGINT,
    [ma_5] FLOAT,
    [ma_200] FLOAT,
    [volatility_5d] FLOAT,
    [volatility_20d] FLOAT,
    [normalized_close] FLOAT,
    [signal_ma_crossover] VARCHAR(100),
    [spy_return] FLOAT,
    [relative_strength] FLOAT
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/gld_av_time_series_daily',
    DATA_SOURCE = eds_fmdpstg2_fd_gld,
    FILE_FORMAT = eff_delta
);
GO
